home.title: Discover Your
home.subtitle: A journey of self-discovery based on Sacred Scripture to discover how God works through you in a unique way.

items.title: Scripture-Based
items.description: Founded on biblical texts and solid theological studies

items.title: Spiritual Self-Discovery
items.description: Discover how God works through you uniquely

items.title: Community Growth
items.description: Understand your role in the Body of Christ and the Church

items.title: Personal History
items.description: Track your spiritual journey and growth over time

items.name: Motivations
items.description: 7 fundamental gifts that are the foundation of Christian personality

items.name: Ministries
items.description: 12 ministries to serve the Body of Christ

items.name: Mary Johnson
items.text: This test helped me better understand my gifts and how I can serve better in church.

items.name: John Smith
items.text: A valuable tool to help church members discover their callings.

items.name: Sarah Wilson
items.text: Very accurate result that confirmed my missionary vocation.

footer.description: Discover your spiritual gifts through a Scripture-based test.

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: To access the spiritual gifts test, you need to log in first. This allows us to save your progress and provide personalized results.

continuePrompt.title: Continue test?
continuePrompt.description: We found a test in progress. You have {count} saved answer(s). Do you want to continue where you left off or start a new test?

login.title: Spiritual Gifts Test
login.subtitle: Ready to discover your spiritual gifts? Let's get started!
login.agreement: By signing in, you agree to take the spiritual gifts assessment and receive personalized results based on your responses.

dashboard.title: My Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your spiritual gifts discovery journey

welcome.title: Welcome to your spiritual journey!
welcome.description: You haven't taken any tests yet. How about discovering your spiritual gifts now?
welcome.testInProgress: You have a test in progress. Continue where you left off or start a new test.

sections.takeAnother: Take more tests to see your evolution
sections.confirmRemovalDescription: Are you sure you want to remove this test from {date}? This action cannot be undone and all test data will be permanently lost.

settings.title: System Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure global application settings and quiz preferences

quiz.title: Questions per Gift Type
quiz.subtitle: Configure how many questions each spiritual gift will have in the quiz. Total questions: {total}

questionsConfig.title: Questions Configuration
questionsConfig.description: Set the number of questions per spiritual gift. This will apply to all seven motivational gifts from Romans 12:6-8.
questionsConfig.label: Questions per Gift
questionsConfig.helperText: Each spiritual gift will have this many questions (Total: {total})
questionsConfig.recommendation: Recommended: 5 questions per gift (35 total questions)

shuffleQuestions.label: Shuffle Questions
shuffleQuestions.description: Randomize question order for each quiz

allowRetake.label: Allow Retake
allowRetake.description: Users can retake the quiz multiple times

userAccess.title: User Access & Registration
userAccess.description: Configure how users can access and use the spiritual gifts test.

enableRegistration.label: Enable User Registration
enableRegistration.description: Allow new users to create accounts

allowGuestQuiz.label: Allow Guest Quizzes
allowGuestQuiz.description: Users can take the quiz without creating an account

localization.title: Language & Localization
localization.description: Configure default language and localization settings.

defaultLanguage.label: Default Language
defaultLanguage.description: The default language for new users and guest sessions

ai.title: AI Settings
ai.subtitle: Configure when and how AI analysis is available to users

aiAnalysisConfig.title: AI Analysis Configuration
aiAnalysisConfig.description: Configure when and how AI analysis is available to users

showAIButton.label: Show AI Analysis Button
showAIButton.description: When enabled, users will see the 'Generate AI Analysis' button on their results page

autoGenerate.label: Auto-Generate Analysis
autoGenerate.description: Automatically generate AI analysis for all completed quizzes

cacheStrategy.label: Cache Strategy
cacheStrategy.description: Choose how AI analyses are cached and reused to optimize performance and costs
cacheStrategy.giftScores: By Gift Scores - Reuse analysis for users with identical gift scores
cacheStrategy.session: By Session - Unique analysis for each quiz session
cacheStrategy.user: By User - One analysis per user (latest results)

serviceSettings.title: AI Service Settings
serviceSettings.description: Configure AI service parameters and behavior

maxTokens.label: Max Response Tokens
maxTokens.description: Maximum length of AI-generated analysis (100-4000 tokens)

temperature.label: Response Creativity (Temperature)
temperature.description: Higher values make responses more creative but less predictable

testAI.label: Test AI Service
testAI.description: Test the AI service configuration with sample data

contentSettings.title: Analysis Content Settings
contentSettings.description: Configure what information is included in AI analyses

includePersonalDevelopment.label: Include Personal Development Suggestions
includePersonalDevelopment.description: AI will provide specific suggestions for developing spiritual gifts

includeMinistryOpportunities.label: Include Ministry Opportunities
includeMinistryOpportunities.description: AI will suggest specific ways to use gifts in ministry contexts

includeBiblicalReferences.label: Include Biblical References
includeBiblicalReferences.description: AI will include relevant Bible verses and passages

usageOverview.title: Usage Overview
usageOverview.description: Current AI analysis usage and cache statistics
usageOverview.note: Note: Detailed usage statistics will be available once the analytics system is implemented. Current settings are being saved automatically.

giftDetails.discoverIfIHave: Discover If I Have This Gift
giftDetails.selectGift: Select a spiritual gift to see more details
giftDetails.motivationsDescription: Motivation gifts are basic impulses implanted by God

cta.title: Ready to discover your gifts?
cta.description: Our test was developed based on Scripture and the document "Spiritual Gifts - The Three Categories" to help you identify and understand the gifts God has given you.

results.title: Your Spiritual Gifts

compatibility.aiDescription: Click "Generate AI Analysis" to get more detailed personalized insights about your spiritual gifts and specific recommendations.
compatibility.completeTest: Complete the test to see your compatibility analysis
compatibility.compatibilityDescription: This section shows how your spiritual gifts work together and offers personalized AI analyses for deeper insights.
compatibility.practicalApplications: How to Apply Your Gifts in Practice
compatibility.aiProcessingResults: Our AI is processing your results to create unique insights

fallbackSynergy.combinationStrength: Your combination of {primary} and {secondary} creates a unique strength
fallbackSynergy.idealCombination: This combination is ideal for ministries that require both {primary} and {secondary}
fallbackSynergy.balanceTime: Balance your time between exercising {primary} and {secondary}
fallbackSynergy.avoidOverload: Avoid overloading yourself trying to use all gifts simultaneously
fallbackSynergy.unionDescription: The union between {primary} and {secondary} forms a solid foundation for effective Christian service
fallbackSynergy.continueBalancing: Continue developing both gifts in balance
fallbackSynergy.worksInHarmony: Your main gifts work in harmony

results.guidanceNotAvailable: Detailed guidance not available for this gift at the moment.

results.biblicalReferencesDescription: Specific biblical verses with practical applications for your gift
